features.title: Why choose Beswib?
features.subtitle: Concrete benefits for every actor in the running ecosystem

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.description: Complete regulatory coverage, fraud reduction and total transfer traceability.

trust.title: Total Trust
trust.description: Verified profiles, guaranteed fraud protection and secure automated process.

search.title: Smart Search
search.description: Advanced filters by distance, date and location with personalized suggestions and alerts.

profitability.title: Maximum Profitability
profitability.description: Last-minute resale at free price with immediate fund reception.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Track market trends in real time with average prices and forecasts.

community.title: Global Community
community.description: Connect with over 12,000 active runners worldwide.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Smart alerts for new bibs, price drops and important reminders.

support.title: Premium Support 24/7
support.description: Dedicated assistance in English with premium guarantees and quick resolution.

journey.title: How does it work?
journey.subtitle: Discover the simple and secure process to sell or buy bibs on Beswib

step3.title: Purchase
step3.content: Enter runner information and secure payment

step2.title: Bib Registration
step2.content: Enter registration number and registration data

step4.title: Listing
step4.content: Set price and publish your public or private offer

step5.title: Payment
step5.content: Receive funds on your Beswib account then withdraw money to your bank account

security.title: Maximum Security
security.subtitle: Every transaction is processed automatically with the highest security standards

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.content: Partnership with race organizers and authorization to ensure legitimacy.

certification.title: Certification
certification.content: Verification of seller registration validity and bib certification for sale.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.content: Collection of new runner registration data and bib ownership transfer.

update.title: Update
update.content: Runner data modification with organizer and information update.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.content: Final validation with all parties and registration confirmation notifications.

notifications.title: Notifications Smart
notifications.description: Alertes intelligentes pour nouveaux dossards, baisses de prix et rappels importants.

support.title: Support Premium 24/7
support.description: Assistance dédiée en français avec garanties premium et résolution rapide.

features.title: Beswib을 선택하는 이유는?

security.description: 완전한 규제 적용, 사기 감소 및 전체 전송 추적 가능성.

trust.description: 검증된 프로필, 사기에 대한 보장된 보호 및 안전한 자동화 프로세스.

search.title: 스마트 검색
search.description: 개인화된 제안 및 알림과 함께 거리, 날짜 및 위치별 고급 필터.

profitability.title: 최대 수익성
profitability.description: 자유 가격으로 막판 재판매 및 즉시 자금 수령.

analytics.title: 분석 및 통찰력
analytics.description: 평균 가격 및 예측과 함께 실시간으로 시장 동향을 추적하세요.

community.title: 글로벌 커뮤니티
community.description: 전 세계 12,000명 이상의 활성 러너와 연결하세요.

notifications.description: 새로운 빕, 가격 하락 및 중요한 알림을 위한 스마트 알림.

support.title: 프리미엄 지원 24/7
support.description: 프리미엄 보장 및 빠른 해결을 갖춘 한국어 전용 지원.
